content: Is that a shovel you have there? I apologize, but please allow me to step back. If clay gets stuck in the fur of my tails, it's a nightmare to get out...

content: Have you ever found anything mysterious while digging with your shovel? {A发呆}For me... well... <style=SizeSmall>I once found some stone carvings engraved with strange inscriptions...</style>
